HediffDef.label: Race: Illithid
HediffDef.description: Illithids, a.k.a Mind Flayers, love to pick your brain. Special Diet Illithids can only survive on humanoid brains, one brain allows them to survive for roughly two weeks. Brains can be obtained by butchering humanoid pawns. Elder Brains Illithid brains can be extracted through surgery to be used to create an Elder Brain Pool, allowing the easy creation of more Illithids using Illithid Tadpoles, implanting them in humanoid hosts. Extra Info - Naturally Undergrounder - Naturally Cannibal - Naturally Psychopath - No Gender
